nodes.text: A Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship was part of a Confederacy of Independent Systems fleet led by the Nihilist over Felucia. During the rebellion there around 22 BBY, a Jedi-led task force intervened. Master Yoda ordered them to concentrate all fire on the Droid Control ship. A pair of younglings trained by Mavra Zane destroyed the Receiver Stations. The vessel was then destroyed.
The Droid Control Ship appears in the Jedi Destiny portion of Kinect Star Wars.
